title: golang 1.5.1 install problem from source code
body:
Hi:
   when I install golang 1.5 from souce code,it turn out follow this:

[root@yf_27_189 src]# ./all.bash 

##### Building Go bootstrap tool.
cmd/dist

go tool dist: cannot invoke C compiler "gcc -std=gnu99": exec: "gcc -std=gnu99": executable file not found in $PATH

Go needs a system C compiler for use with cgo.
To set a C compiler, export CC=the-compiler.
To disable cgo, export CGO_ENABLED=0.

Has somebody gotten into this trouble. please tell me how to solve this. thanks.
